 109	 func registerServiceEvents(onChallengeTypeReceived: @escaping (Challenge) -> Void) {
 110	 livenessService?.register(onComplete: { [weak self] reason in
 111	 self?.stopRecording()
 112	
 113	 switch reason {
 114	 case .disconnectionEvent:
 115	 DispatchQueue.main.async {
 116	 self?.livenessState.complete()
 117	 }
 118	 case .unexpectedClosure:
 119	 DispatchQueue.main.async {
 120	 self?.livenessState
 121	 .unrecoverableStateEncountered(.socketClosed)
 122	 }
 123	 }
 124	 })
 125

 127	 listener: { [weak self] _sessionConfiguration in
 128	 self?.sessionConfiguration = _sessionConfiguration
 129	 },
 130	 on: .challenge
 131	 )
 132

 134	 listener: { [weak self] _challenge in
 135	 self?.challengeReceived = _challenge
 136	 self?.configureCaptureSession(challenge: _challenge)
 137	 onChallengeTypeReceived(_challenge)
 138	 },
 139	 on: .challenge)
 140	 }

 420	 switch challenge {

 422	 cameraPosition = challengeOptions.faceMovementChallengeOption.camera
 423	 case .faceMovementAndLightChallenge:
 424	 cameraPosition = challengeOptions.faceMovementAndLightChallengeOption.camera

 431

 433	 captureDevice: .init(avCaptureDevice: avCaptureDevice),
 434	 outputDelegate: OutputSampleBufferCapturer(

 246	
 247	 func mapError(_ livenessError: LivenessStateMachine.LivenessError) -> FaceLivenessDetectionError {
 248	 switch livenessError {
 249	 case .userCancelled, .viewResignation:
 250	 return .userCancelled
 251	 case .timedOut:
 252	 return .faceInOvalMatchExceededTimeLimitError
 253	 case .couldNotOpenStream, .socketClosed:
 254	 return .socketClosed
 255	 case .cameraNotAvailable:
 256	 return .cameraNotAvailable
 257	 default:
 258	 return .cameraPermissionDenied
 259	 }
 260	 }
 261	
 262	 private func requestCameraPermission(for challenge: Challenge) {
 263	 AVCaptureDevice.requestAccess(
 264	 for: .video,
 265	 completionHandler: { accessGranted in
 266	 guard accessGranted == true else { return }
 267	 displayState = .awaitingLivenessSession(challenge)
 268	 }
 269	 )
 270	 }
 271	
 272	 private func alertCameraAccessNeeded() {
 273	 displayingCameraPermissionsNeededAlert = true
 274	 }

 290	
 291	enum DisplayState: Equatable {
 292	 case awaitingChallengeType
 293	 case awaitingCameraPermission(Challenge)
 294	 case awaitingLivenessSession(Challenge)
 295	 case displayingGetReadyView(Challenge, LivenessCamera)
 296	 case displayingLiveness
 297	 
 298	 static func == (lhs: DisplayState, rhs: DisplayState) -> Bool {
 299	 switch (lhs, rhs) {
 300	 case (.awaitingChallengeType, .awaitingChallengeType):
 301	 return true
 302	 case (let .awaitingLivenessSession(c1), let .awaitingLivenessSession(c2)):
 303	 return c1 == c2
 304	 case (let .displayingGetReadyView(c1, position1), let .displayingGetReadyView(c2, position2)):
 305	 return c1 == c2 && position1 == position2
 306	 case (.displayingLiveness, .displayingLiveness):
 307	 return true
 308	 case (.awaitingCameraPermission, .awaitingCameraPermission):
 309	 return true
 310	 default:
 311	 return false
 312	 }
 313	 }
 314	}

 116	
 117	 func handleInstruction(
 118	 _ instruction: Instructor.Instruction,
 119	 colorSequences: [FaceLivenessSession.DisplayColor]?
 120	 ) {
 121	 DispatchQueue.main.async {
 122	 switch instruction {
 123	 case .match:
 124	 self.livenessState.faceMatched()
 125	 self.faceMatchedTimestamp = Date().timestampMilliseconds
 126	 
 127	 // next step after face match
 128	 switch self.challengeReceived{
 129	 case .faceMovementAndLightChallenge:
 130	 if let colorSequences = colorSequences {
 131	 DispatchQueue.main.asyncAfter(deadline: .now() + 1.0) {
 132	 self.livenessViewControllerDelegate?.displayFreshness(colorSequences: colorSequences)
 133	 }
 134	 }
 135	 case .faceMovementChallenge:
 136	 self.livenessViewControllerDelegate?.completeNoLightCheck()
 137	 default:
 138	 break
 139	 }

 291	enum DisplayState: Equatable {
 292	 case awaitingChallengeType
 293	 case awaitingCameraPermission(Challenge)
 294	 case awaitingLivenessSession(Challenge)
 295	 case displayingGetReadyView(Challenge, LivenessCamera)
 296	 case displayingLiveness
 297	 
 298	 static func == (lhs: DisplayState, rhs: DisplayState) -> Bool {
 299	 switch (lhs, rhs) {
 300	 case (.awaitingChallengeType, .awaitingChallengeType):
 301	 return true
 302	 case (let .awaitingLivenessSession(c1), let .awaitingLivenessSession(c2)):
 303	 return c1 == c2
 304	 case (let .displayingGetReadyView(c1, position1), let .displayingGetReadyView(c2, position2)):
 305	 return c1 == c2 && position1 == position2
 306	 case (.displayingLiveness, .displayingLiveness):
 307	 return true
 308	 case (.awaitingCameraPermission, .awaitingCameraPermission):
 309	 return true
 310	 default:
 311	 return false
 312	 }
 313	 }
 314	}

 19	 enum Instruction: Equatable {
 20	 case `match`
 21	 case tooFarLeft(
 22	 text: String = "Move head right",
 23	 nearnessPercentage: Double
 24	 )
 25	 case tooFarRight(
 26	 text: String = "Move head left",
 27	 nearnessPercentage: Double
 28	 )
 29	 case tooClose(
 30	 text: String = "Move head farther.",
 31	 nearnessPercentage: Double
 32	 )
 33	 case tooFar(
 34	 text: String = "Move head closer.",
 35	 nearnessPercentage: Double
 36	 )
 37	 case none
 38	
 39	 static func == (lhs: Instruction, rhs: Instruction) -> Bool {
 40	 switch (lhs, rhs) {
 41	 case (.match, .match): return true
 42	 case (.tooFarLeft, .tooFarLeft): return true
 43	 case (.tooFarRight, .tooFarRight): return true
 44	 case (.tooClose, .tooClose): return true
 45	 case (.tooFar, .tooFar): return true
 46	 default: return false
 47	 }
 48	 }
 49	 }

 418	 func configureCaptureSession(challenge: Challenge) {
 419	 let cameraPosition: LivenessCamera
 420	 switch challenge {
 421	 case .faceMovementChallenge:
 422	 cameraPosition = challengeOptions.faceMovementChallengeOption.camera
 423	 case .faceMovementAndLightChallenge:
 424	 cameraPosition = challengeOptions.faceMovementAndLightChallengeOption.camera
 425	 }
 426	 
 427	 let avCaptureDevice = AVCaptureDevice.default(
 428	 .builtInWideAngleCamera,
 429	 for: .video,
 430	 position: cameraPosition == .front ? .front : .back)
 431	
 432	 self.captureSession = LivenessCaptureSession(
 433	 captureDevice: .init(avCaptureDevice: avCaptureDevice),
 434	 outputDelegate: OutputSampleBufferCapturer(
 435	 faceDetector: self.faceDetector,
 436	 videoChunker: self.videoChunker
 437	 )
 438	 )
 439	 }
 440	}

 116	
 117	 func handleInstruction(
 118	 _ instruction: Instructor.Instruction,
 119	 colorSequences: [FaceLivenessSession.DisplayColor]?
 120	 ) {
 121	 DispatchQueue.main.async {
 122	 switch instruction {
 123	 case .match:
 124	 self.livenessState.faceMatched()
 125	 self.faceMatchedTimestamp = Date().timestampMilliseconds
 126	 
 127	 // next step after face match
 128	 switch self.challengeReceived{
 129	 case .faceMovementAndLightChallenge:
 130	 if let colorSequences = colorSequences {
 131	 DispatchQueue.main.asyncAfter(deadline: .now() + 1.0) {
 132	 self.livenessViewControllerDelegate?.displayFreshness(colorSequences: colorSequences)
 133	 }
 134	 }
 135	 case .faceMovementChallenge:
 136	 self.livenessViewControllerDelegate?.completeNoLightCheck()
 137	 default:
 138	 break
 139	 }

 51	 var noFitTimeoutInterval: TimeInterval {
 52	 guard let sessionConfiguration = sessionConfiguration else {
 53	 return defaultNoFitTimeoutInterval
 54	 }
 55	 
 56	 let ovalMatchChallenge: FaceLivenessSession.OvalMatchChallenge
 57	 switch sessionConfiguration{
 58	 case .faceMovement(let challenge):
 59	 ovalMatchChallenge = challenge
 60	 case .faceMovementAndLight(_, let challenge):
 61	 ovalMatchChallenge = challenge
 62	 }
 63	 
 64	 let sessionTimeoutMilliSec = ovalMatchChallenge.oval.ovalFitTimeout
 65	 return TimeInterval(sessionTimeoutMilliSec/1_000)
 66	 }

 108	
 109	 func registerServiceEvents(onChallengeTypeReceived: @escaping (Challenge) -> Void) {
 110	 livenessService?.register(onComplete: { [weak self] reason in
 111	 self?.stopRecording()
 112	
 113	 switch reason {
 114	 case .disconnectionEvent:
 115	 DispatchQueue.main.async {
 116	 self?.livenessState.complete()
 117	 }
 118	 case .unexpectedClosure:
 119	 DispatchQueue.main.async {
 120	 self?.livenessState
 121	 .unrecoverableStateEncountered(.socketClosed)
 122	 }
 123	 }
 124	 })
 125	
 126	 livenessService?.register(
 127	 listener: { [weak self] _sessionConfiguration in
 128	 self?.sessionConfiguration = _sessionConfiguration
 129	 },
 130	 on: .challenge
 131	 )
 132	 
 133	 livenessService?.register(
 134	 listener: { [weak self] _challenge in
 135	 self?.challengeReceived = _challenge
 136	 self?.configureCaptureSession(challenge: _challenge)
 137	 onChallengeTypeReceived(_challenge)
 138	 },
 139	 on: .challenge)
 140	 }

 175	 func drawOval(onComplete: @escaping () -> Void) {
 176	 guard livenessState.state == .recording(ovalDisplayed: false),
 177	 let sessionConfiguration = sessionConfiguration else { return }
 178

 39	 static func == (lhs: Instruction, rhs: Instruction) -> Bool {
 40	 switch (lhs, rhs) {
 41	 case (.match, .match): return true
 42	 case (.tooFarLeft, .tooFarLeft): return true
 43	 case (.tooFarRight, .tooFarRight): return true
 44	 case (.tooClose, .tooClose): return true
 45	 case (.tooFar, .tooFar): return true
 46	 default: return false
 47	 }
 48	 }

 108	
 109	 func registerServiceEvents(onChallengeTypeReceived: @escaping (Challenge) -> Void) {
 110	 livenessService?.register(onComplete: { [weak self] reason in
 111	 self?.stopRecording()
 112	
 113	 switch reason {
 114	 case .disconnectionEvent:
 115	 DispatchQueue.main.async {
 116	 self?.livenessState.complete()
 117	 }
 118	 case .unexpectedClosure:
 119	 DispatchQueue.main.async {
 120	 self?.livenessState
 121	 .unrecoverableStateEncountered(.socketClosed)
 122	 }
 123	 }
 124	 })
 125	
 126	 livenessService?.register(
 127	 listener: { [weak self] _sessionConfiguration in
 128	 self?.sessionConfiguration = _sessionConfiguration
 129	 },
 130	 on: .challenge
 131	 )
 132	 
 133	 livenessService?.register(
 134	 listener: { [weak self] _challenge in
 135	 self?.challengeReceived = _challenge
 136	 self?.configureCaptureSession(challenge: _challenge)
 137	 onChallengeTypeReceived(_challenge)
 138	 },
 139	 on: .challenge)
 140	 }
 141	
 142	 @objc func willResignActive(_ notification: Notification) {
 143	 guard self.livenessState.state != .initial else { return }
 144	 DispatchQueue.main.async {
 145	 self.stopRecording()
 146	 self.livenessState.unrecoverableStateEncountered(.viewResignation)
 147	 }
 148	 }

 169	 )

","workspace_file_chunks":[]},{"status":"success","request_id":"e4e38f46-8a54-4d2b-8274-07717ebf8075","request_message":"","structured_output_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":0,"content":"Perfect! Now I have all the information needed to show you where and how to set up the challenge to `faceMovementChallenge`. Here's the complete answer:

## Where to Set Up the Challenge to `faceMovementChallenge`

You can set up the challenge to `faceMovementChallenge` when creating the `FaceLivenessDetectorView` by configuring the `ChallengeOptions` parameter. Here are the different ways to do it:

### 1. **When Creating FaceLivenessDetectorView** (Main Configuration Point)

<augment_code_snippet path="Sources/FaceLiveness/Views/Liveness/FaceLivenessDetectionView.swift" mode="EXCERPT">
```swift
public init(
 sessionID: String,
 credentialsProvider: AWSCredentialsProvider? = nil,
 region: String,
 disableStartView: Bool = false,
 challengeOptions: ChallengeOptions = .init(), // ← Configure here
 isPresented: Binding<Bool>,
 onCompletion: @escaping (Result<Void, FaceLivenessDetectionError>) -> Void
)
```
</augment_code_snippet>

### 2. **Configuration Options Available**

#### **Option A: Use Front Camera for Face Movement Challenge**
```swift
let challengeOptions = ChallengeOptions(
 faceMovementChallengeOption: .init(camera: .front),
 faceMovementAndLightChallengeOption: .init()
)

let livenessView = FaceLivenessDetectorView(
 sessionID: "your-session-id",
 region: "us-east-1",
 challengeOptions: challengeOptions,
 isPresented: $isPresented,
 onCompletion: { result in
 // Handle completion
 }
)
```

#### **Option B: Use Back Camera for Face Movement Challenge**
```swift
let challengeOptions = ChallengeOptions(
 faceMovementChallengeOption: .init(camera: .back), // ← Back camera
 faceMovementAndLightChallengeOption: .init()
)
```

### 3. **Challenge Types Defined**

<augment_code_snippet path="Sources/FaceLiveness/Views/Liveness/FaceLivenessDetectionView.swift" mode="EXCERPT">
```swift
public struct FaceMovementChallengeOption {
 let challenge: Challenge
 let camera: LivenessCamera
 
 public init(camera: LivenessCamera) {
 self.challenge = .faceMovementChallenge("1.0.0") // ← Face movement only
 self.camera = camera
 }
}

public struct FaceMovementAndLightChallengeOption {
 let challenge: Challenge
 let camera: LivenessCamera
 
 public init() {
 self.challenge = .faceMovementAndLightChallenge("2.0.0") // ← Face movement + light
 self.camera = .front
 }
}
```
</augment_code_snippet>

### 4. **Camera Options Available**

<augment_code_snippet path="Sources/FaceLiveness/Views/Liveness/FaceLivenessDetectionView.swift" mode="EXCERPT">
```swift
public enum LivenessCamera {
 case front
 case back
}
```
</augment_code_snippet>

### 5. **How Both Challenges Are Sent to the Service**

<augment_code_snippet path="Sources/FaceLiveness/Views/Liveness/FaceLivenessDetectionViewModel.swift" mode="EXCERPT">
```swift
try livenessService?.initializeLivenessStream(
 withSessionID: sessionID,
 userAgent: UserAgentValues.standard().userAgentString,
 challenges: [challengeOptions.faceMovementChallengeOption.challenge,
 challengeOptions.faceMovementAndLightChallengeOption.challenge], // ← Both sent
 options: .init(
 attemptCount: Self.attemptCount,
 preCheckViewEnabled: isPreviewScreenEnabled)
)
```
</augment_code_snippet>

### 6. **Example from Tests**

<augment_code_snippet path="Tests/FaceLivenessTests/CredentialsProviderTestCase.swift" mode="EXCERPT">
```swift
challengeOptions: .init(
 faceMovementChallengeOption: .init(camera: .front),
 faceMovementAndLightChallengeOption: .init()
)
```
</augment_code_snippet>

### **Key Points:**

1. **Both challenges are always sent** to the service - the server decides which one to use
2. **You configure the camera** for each challenge type (front/back)
3. **The actual challenge selection** happens on the server side and is received via the callback
4. **Default configuration** uses front camera for face movement challenge
5. **The challenge parameter** in the closure (line 127) is the server's response about which challenge to use

### **Summary:**
To set up the challenge to use `faceMovementChallenge`, configure the `ChallengeOptions` when creating the `FaceLivenessDetectorView`, specifying the camera position you want to use (`.front` or `.back`). The server will ultimately decide which challenge type to activate based on your configuration and other factors.

 285	 @unknown default:
 286	 break

 8	import AVFoundation
 9	
 10	struct LivenessCaptureDevice {
 11	 let avCaptureDevice: AVCaptureDevice?
 12	 var preset: AVCaptureSession.Preset = .vga640x480
 13	 var fps: Double = 30
 14	 var exposure: AVCaptureDevice.ExposureMode = .continuousAutoExposure
 15	 var whiteBalance: AVCaptureDevice.WhiteBalanceMode = .continuousAutoWhiteBalance
 16	 var focus: AVCaptureDevice.FocusMode = .continuousAutoFocus
 17	
 18	 func configure() throws {
 19	 guard let avCaptureDevice else { throw LivenessCaptureSessionError.cameraUnavailable }
 20	 try avCaptureDevice.lockForConfiguration()
 21	 defer { avCaptureDevice.unlockForConfiguration() }
 22	
 23	 let fps = CMTimeScale(fps)
 24	 let frameDuration = CMTime(value: 1, timescale: fps)
 25	 avCaptureDevice.activeVideoMinFrameDuration = frameDuration
 26	 avCaptureDevice.activeVideoMaxFrameDuration = frameDuration
 27	 if avCaptureDevice.isExposureModeSupported(exposure) {
 28	 avCaptureDevice.exposureMode = exposure
 29	 }
 30	
 31	 if avCaptureDevice.isFocusModeSupported(focus) {
 32	 avCaptureDevice.focusMode = focus
 33	 }
 34	
 35	 if avCaptureDevice.isWhiteBalanceModeSupported(whiteBalance) {
 36	 avCaptureDevice.whiteBalanceMode = whiteBalance
 37	 }
 38	 }
 39	}

 142	 @objc func willResignActive(_ notification: Notification) {
 143	 guard self.livenessState.state != .initial else { return }
 144	 DispatchQueue.main.async {
 145	 self.stopRecording()
 146	 self.livenessState.unrecoverableStateEncountered(.viewResignation)
 147	 }
 148	 }

 151	 captureSession?.startSession()
 152	 }

 155	 captureSession?.stopRunning()
 156	 }

 160	 let avLayer = try captureSession?.configureCamera(frame: frame)
 161	 DispatchQueue.main.async {
 162	 self.livenessState.checkIsFacePrepared()
 163	 }
 164	 return avLayer
 165	 } catch {
 166	 DispatchQueue.main.async {
 167	 self.livenessState.unrecoverableStateEncountered(
 168	 self.generateLivenessError(from: error)
 169	 )
 170	 }
 171	 return nil
 172	 }
 173	 }

 212	 func initializeLivenessStream() {
 213	 do {
 214	 if (abs(Self.attemptIdTimeStamp.timeIntervalSinceNow) > defaultAttemptCountResetInterval) {
 215	 Self.attemptCount = 1
 216	 } else {
 217	 Self.attemptCount += 1
 218	 }
 219	 Self.attemptIdTimeStamp = Date()
 220	 
 221	 try livenessService?.initializeLivenessStream(
 222	 withSessionID: sessionID,
 223	 userAgent: UserAgentValues.standard().userAgentString,
 224	 challenges: [challengeOptions.faceMovementChallengeOption.challenge,
 225	 challengeOptions.faceMovementAndLightChallengeOption.challenge],
 226	 options: .init(
 227	 attemptCount: Self.attemptCount,
 228	 preCheckViewEnabled: isPreviewScreenEnabled)
 229	 )
 230	 } catch {
 231	 DispatchQueue.main.async {
 232	 self.livenessState.unrecoverableStateEncountered(.couldNotOpenStream)
 233	 }
 234	 }
 235	 }

 418	 func configureCaptureSession(challenge: Challenge) {
 419	 let cameraPosition: LivenessCamera
 420	 switch challenge {
 421	 case .faceMovementChallenge:
 422	 cameraPosition = challengeOptions.faceMovementChallengeOption.camera
 423	 case .faceMovementAndLightChallenge:
 424	 cameraPosition = challengeOptions.faceMovementAndLightChallengeOption.camera
 425	 }
 426	 
 427	 let avCaptureDevice = AVCaptureDevice.default(
 428	 .builtInWideAngleCamera,
 429	 for: .video,
 430	 position: cameraPosition == .front ? .front : .back)
 431	
 432	 self.captureSession = LivenessCaptureSession(
 433	 captureDevice: .init(avCaptureDevice: avCaptureDevice),
 434	 outputDelegate: OutputSampleBufferCapturer(
 435	 faceDetector: self.faceDetector,
 436	 videoChunker: self.videoChunker
 437	 )
 438	 )
 439	 }

Now I have all the information needed to show you where and how to set up the challenge to `faceMovementChallenge`. Here's the complete answer:

## Where to Set Up the Challenge to `faceMovementChallenge`

You can set up the challenge to `faceMovementChallenge` when creating the `FaceLivenessDetectorView` by configuring the `ChallengeOptions` parameter. Here are the different ways to do it:

### 1. **When Creating FaceLivenessDetectorView** (Main Configuration Point)

````swift path=Sources/FaceLiveness/Views/Liveness/FaceLivenessDetectionView.swift mode=EXCERPT
public init(
 sessionID: String,
 credentialsProvider: AWSCredentialsProvider? = nil,
 region: String,
 disableStartView: Bool = false,
 challengeOptions: ChallengeOptions = .init(), // ← Configure here
 isPresented: Binding<Bool>,
 onCompletion: @escaping (Result<Void, FaceLivenessDetectionError>) -> Void
)
````

### 2. **Configuration Options Available**

#### **Option A: Use Front Camera for Face Movement Challenge**
```swift
let challengeOptions = ChallengeOptions(
 faceMovementChallengeOption: .init(camera: .front),
 faceMovementAndLightChallengeOption: .init()
)

let livenessView = FaceLivenessDetectorView(
 sessionID: "your-session-id",
 region: "us-east-1",
 challengeOptions: challengeOptions,
 isPresented: $isPresented,
 onCompletion: { result in
 // Handle completion
 }
)
```

#### **Option B: Use Back Camera for Face Movement Challenge**
```swift
let challengeOptions = ChallengeOptions(
 faceMovementChallengeOption: .init(camera: .back), // ← Back camera
 faceMovementAndLightChallengeOption: .init()
)
```

### 3. **Challenge Types Defined**

````swift path=Sources/FaceLiveness/Views/Liveness/FaceLivenessDetectionView.swift mode=EXCERPT
public struct FaceMovementChallengeOption {
 let challenge: Challenge
 let camera: LivenessCamera
 
 public init(camera: LivenessCamera) {
 self.challenge = .faceMovementChallenge("1.0.0") // ← Face movement only
 self.camera = camera
 }
}

public struct FaceMovementAndLightChallengeOption {
 let challenge: Challenge
 let camera: LivenessCamera
 
 public init() {
 self.challenge = .faceMovementAndLightChallenge("2.0.0") // ← Face movement + light
 self.camera = .front
 }
}
````

### 4. **Camera Options Available**

````swift path=Sources/FaceLiveness/Views/Liveness/FaceLivenessDetectionView.swift mode=EXCERPT
public enum LivenessCamera {
 case front
 case back
}
````

### 5. **How Both Challenges Are Sent to the Service**

````swift path=Sources/FaceLiveness/Views/Liveness/FaceLivenessDetectionViewModel.swift mode=EXCERPT
try livenessService?.initializeLivenessStream(
 withSessionID: sessionID,
 userAgent: UserAgentValues.standard().userAgentString,
 challenges: [challengeOptions.faceMovementChallengeOption.challenge,
 challengeOptions.faceMovementAndLightChallengeOption.challenge], // ← Both sent
 options: .init(
 attemptCount: Self.attemptCount,
 preCheckViewEnabled: isPreviewScreenEnabled)
)
````

### 6. **Example from Tests**

````swift path=Tests/FaceLivenessTests/CredentialsProviderTestCase.swift mode=EXCERPT
challengeOptions: .init(
 faceMovementChallengeOption: .init(camera: .front),
 faceMovementAndLightChallengeOption: .init()
)
````

### **Key Points:**

1. **Both challenges are always sent** to the service - the server decides which one to use
2. **You configure the camera** for each challenge type (front/back)
3. **The actual challenge selection** happens on the server side and is received via the callback
4. **Default configuration** uses front camera for face movement challenge
5. **The challenge parameter** in the closure (line 127) is the server's response about which challenge to use

### **Summary:**
To set up the challenge to use `faceMovementChallenge`, configure the `ChallengeOptions` when creating the `FaceLivenessDetectorView`, specifying the camera position you want to use (`.front` or `.back`). The server will ultimately decide which challenge type to activate based on your configuration and other factors.

 109	 func registerServiceEvents(onChallengeTypeReceived: @escaping (Challenge) -> Void) {
 110	 livenessService?.register(onComplete: { [weak self] reason in
 111	 self?.stopRecording()
 112	
 113	 switch reason {
 114	 case .disconnectionEvent:
 115	 DispatchQueue.main.async {
 116	 self?.livenessState.complete()
 117	 }
 118	 case .unexpectedClosure:
 119	 DispatchQueue.main.async {
 120	 self?.livenessState
 121	 .unrecoverableStateEncountered(.socketClosed)
 122	 }
 123	 }
 124	 })
 125	
 126	 livenessService?.register(
 127	 listener: { [weak self] _sessionConfiguration in
 128	 self?.sessionConfiguration = _sessionConfiguration
 129	 },
 130	 on: .challenge
 131	 )

 135	 self?.challengeReceived = _challenge
 136	 self?.configureCaptureSession(challenge: _challenge)
 137	 onChallengeTypeReceived(_challenge)

 418	 func configureCaptureSession(challenge: Challenge) {
 419	 let cameraPosition: LivenessCamera
 420	 switch challenge {
 421	 case .faceMovementChallenge:
 422	 cameraPosition = challengeOptions.faceMovementChallengeOption.camera
 423	 case .faceMovementAndLightChallenge:
 424	 cameraPosition = challengeOptions.faceMovementAndLightChallengeOption.camera
 425	 }
 426	 
 427	 let avCaptureDevice = AVCaptureDevice.default(
 428	 .builtInWideAngleCamera,
 429	 for: .video,
 430	 position: cameraPosition == .front ? .front : .back)
 431	
 432	 self.captureSession = LivenessCaptureSession(
 433	 captureDevice: .init(avCaptureDevice: avCaptureDevice),
 434	 outputDelegate: OutputSampleBufferCapturer(
 435	 faceDetector: self.faceDetector,
 436	 videoChunker: self.videoChunker
 437	 )
 438	 )
 439	 }
 440	}

 246	
 247	 func mapError(_ livenessError: LivenessStateMachine.LivenessError) -> FaceLivenessDetectionError {
 248	 switch livenessError {
 249	 case .userCancelled, .viewResignation:
 250	 return .userCancelled
 251	 case .timedOut:
 252	 return .faceInOvalMatchExceededTimeLimitError
 253	 case .couldNotOpenStream, .socketClosed:
 254	 return .socketClosed
 255	 case .cameraNotAvailable:
 256	 return .cameraNotAvailable
 257	 default:
 258	 return .cameraPermissionDenied
 259	 }
 260	 }
 261	
 262	 private func requestCameraPermission(for challenge: Challenge) {
 263	 AVCaptureDevice.requestAccess(
 264	 for: .video,
 265	 completionHandler: { accessGranted in
 266	 guard accessGranted == true else { return }
 267	 displayState = .awaitingLivenessSession(challenge)
 268	 }
 269	 )
 270	 }
 271	
 272	 private func alertCameraAccessNeeded() {
 273	 displayingCameraPermissionsNeededAlert = true
 274	 }

 290	
 291	enum DisplayState: Equatable {
 292	 case awaitingChallengeType
 293	 case awaitingCameraPermission(Challenge)
 294	 case awaitingLivenessSession(Challenge)
 295	 case displayingGetReadyView(Challenge, LivenessCamera)
 296	 case displayingLiveness
 297	 
 298	 static func == (lhs: DisplayState, rhs: DisplayState) -> Bool {
 299	 switch (lhs, rhs) {
 300	 case (.awaitingChallengeType, .awaitingChallengeType):
 301	 return true
 302	 case (let .awaitingLivenessSession(c1), let .awaitingLivenessSession(c2)):
 303	 return c1 == c2
 304	 case (let .displayingGetReadyView(c1, position1), let .displayingGetReadyView(c2, position2)):
 305	 return c1 == c2 && position1 == position2
 306	 case (.displayingLiveness, .displayingLiveness):
 307	 return true
 308	 case (.awaitingCameraPermission, .awaitingCameraPermission):
 309	 return true
 310	 default:
 311	 return false
 312	 }
 313	 }
 314	}

 117	 func handleInstruction(
 118	 _ instruction: Instructor.Instruction,
 119	 colorSequences: [FaceLivenessSession.DisplayColor]?
 120	 ) {
 121	 DispatchQueue.main.async {
 122	 switch instruction {
 123	 case .match:
 124	 self.livenessState.faceMatched()
 125	 self.faceMatchedTimestamp = Date().timestampMilliseconds
 126	 
 127	 // next step after face match
 128	 switch self.challengeReceived{
 129	 case .faceMovementAndLightChallenge:
 130	 if let colorSequences = colorSequences {
 131	 DispatchQueue.main.asyncAfter(deadline: .now() + 1.0) {
 132	 self.livenessViewControllerDelegate?.displayFreshness(colorSequences: colorSequences)
 133	 }
 134	 }
 135	 case .faceMovementChallenge:
 136	 self.livenessViewControllerDelegate?.completeNoLightCheck()
 137	 default:
 138	 break
 139	 }

 246	
 247	 func mapError(_ livenessError: LivenessStateMachine.LivenessError) -> FaceLivenessDetectionError {
 248	 switch livenessError {
 249	 case .userCancelled, .viewResignation:
 250	 return .userCancelled
 251	 case .timedOut:
 252	 return .faceInOvalMatchExceededTimeLimitError
 253	 case .couldNotOpenStream, .socketClosed:
 254	 return .socketClosed
 255	 case .cameraNotAvailable:
 256	 return .cameraNotAvailable
 257	 default:
 258	 return .cameraPermissionDenied
 259	 }
 260	 }
 261	
 262	 private func requestCameraPermission(for challenge: Challenge) {
 263	 AVCaptureDevice.requestAccess(
 264	 for: .video,
 265	 completionHandler: { accessGranted in
 266	 guard accessGranted == true else { return }
 267	 displayState = .awaitingLivenessSession(challenge)
 268	 }
 269	 )
 270	 }
 271	
 272	 private func alertCameraAccessNeeded() {
 273	 displayingCameraPermissionsNeededAlert = true
 274	 }

 290	
 291	enum DisplayState: Equatable {
 292	 case awaitingChallengeType
 293	 case awaitingCameraPermission(Challenge)
 294	 case awaitingLivenessSession(Challenge)
 295	 case displayingGetReadyView(Challenge, LivenessCamera)
 296	 case displayingLiveness
 297	 
 298	 static func == (lhs: DisplayState, rhs: DisplayState) -> Bool {
 299	 switch (lhs, rhs) {
 300	 case (.awaitingChallengeType, .awaitingChallengeType):
 301	 return true
 302	 case (let .awaitingLivenessSession(c1), let .awaitingLivenessSession(c2)):
 303	 return c1 == c2
 304	 case (let .displayingGetReadyView(c1, position1), let .displayingGetReadyView(c2, position2)):
 305	 return c1 == c2 && position1 == position2
 306	 case (.displayingLiveness, .displayingLiveness):
 307	 return true
 308	 case (.awaitingCameraPermission, .awaitingCameraPermission):
 309	 return true
 310	 default:
 311	 return false
 312	 }
 313	 }
 314	}

 19	 enum Instruction: Equatable {
 20	 case `match`
 21	 case tooFarLeft(
 22	 text: String = "Move head right",
 23	 nearnessPercentage: Double
 24	 )
 25	 case tooFarRight(
 26	 text: String = "Move head left",
 27	 nearnessPercentage: Double
 28	 )
 29	 case tooClose(
 30	 text: String = "Move head farther.",
 31	 nearnessPercentage: Double
 32	 )
 33	 case tooFar(
 34	 text: String = "Move head closer.",
 35	 nearnessPercentage: Double
 36	 )
 37	 case none
 38	
 39	 static func == (lhs: Instruction, rhs: Instruction) -> Bool {
 40	 switch (lhs, rhs) {
 41	 case (.match, .match): return true
 42	 case (.tooFarLeft, .tooFarLeft): return true
 43	 case (.tooFarRight, .tooFarRight): return true
 44	 case (.tooClose, .tooClose): return true
 45	 case (.tooFar, .tooFar): return true
 46	 default: return false
 47	 }
 48	 }
 49	 }

 434	 outputDelegate: OutputSampleBufferCapturer(

 108	
 109	 func registerServiceEvents(onChallengeTypeReceived: @escaping (Challenge) -> Void) {
 110	 livenessService?.register(onComplete: { [weak self] reason in
 111	 self?.stopRecording()
 112	
 113	 switch reason {
 114	 case .disconnectionEvent:
 115	 DispatchQueue.main.async {
 116	 self?.livenessState.complete()
 117	 }
 118	 case .unexpectedClosure:
 119	 DispatchQueue.main.async {
 120	 self?.livenessState
 121	 .unrecoverableStateEncountered(.socketClosed)
 122	 }
 123	 }
 124	 })
 125	
 126	 livenessService?.register(
 127	 listener: { [weak self] _sessionConfiguration in
 128	 self?.sessionConfiguration = _sessionConfiguration
 129	 },
 130	 on: .challenge
 131	 )
 132	 
 133	 livenessService?.register(
 134	 listener: { [weak self] _challenge in
 135	 self?.challengeReceived = _challenge
 136	 self?.configureCaptureSession(challenge: _challenge)
 137	 onChallengeTypeReceived(_challenge)
 138	 },
 139	 on: .challenge)
 140	 }

 93	 struct Thresholds {
 94	 let intersection: Double
 95	 let ovalMatchWidth: Double
 96	 let ovalMatchHeight: Double
 97	 let faceDetectionWidth: Double
 98	 let faceDetectionHeight: Double
 99	
 100	 init(oval: CGRect, challengeConfig: FaceLivenessSession.OvalMatchChallenge) {

 102	 ovalMatchWidth = oval.width * challengeConfig.oval.iouWidthThreshold
 103	 ovalMatchHeight = oval.height * challengeConfig.oval.iouHeightThreshold
 104	 faceDetectionWidth = oval.width * challengeConfig.face.iouWidthThreshold
 105	 faceDetectionHeight = oval.height * challengeConfig.face.iouHeightThreshold
 106	 }
 107	 }

 39	 static func == (lhs: Instruction, rhs: Instruction) -> Bool {
 40	 switch (lhs, rhs) {
 41	 case (.match, .match): return true
 42	 case (.tooFarLeft, .tooFarLeft): return true
 43	 case (.tooFarRight, .tooFarRight): return true
 44	 case (.tooClose, .tooClose): return true
 45	 case (.tooFar, .tooFar): return true
 46	 default: return false
 47	 }
 48	 }

 247	 func mapError(_ livenessError: LivenessStateMachine.LivenessError) -> FaceLivenessDetectionError {
 248	 switch livenessError {
 249	 case .userCancelled, .viewResignation:
 250	 return .userCancelled
 251	 case .timedOut:
 252	 return .faceInOvalMatchExceededTimeLimitError
 253	 case .couldNotOpenStream, .socketClosed:
 254	 return .socketClosed
 255	 case .cameraNotAvailable:
 256	 return .cameraNotAvailable
 257	 default:
 258	 return .cameraPermissionDenied
 259	 }
 260	 }

 263	 AVCaptureDevice.requestAccess(
 264	 for: .video,
 265	 completionHandler: { accessGranted in
 266	 guard accessGranted == true else { return }
 267	 displayState = .awaitingLivenessSession(challenge)
 268	 }
 269	 )
 270	 }

 108	
 109	 func registerServiceEvents(onChallengeTypeReceived: @escaping (Challenge) -> Void) {
 110	 livenessService?.register(onComplete: { [weak self] reason in
 111	 self?.stopRecording()
 112	
 113	 switch reason {
 114	 case .disconnectionEvent:
 115	 DispatchQueue.main.async {
 116	 self?.livenessState.complete()
 117	 }
 118	 case .unexpectedClosure:
 119	 DispatchQueue.main.async {
 120	 self?.livenessState
 121	 .unrecoverableStateEncountered(.socketClosed)
 122	 }
 123	 }
 124	 })
 125	
 126	 livenessService?.register(
 127	 listener: { [weak self] _sessionConfiguration in
 128	 self?.sessionConfiguration = _sessionConfiguration
 129	 },
 130	 on: .challenge
 131	 )
 132	 
 133	 livenessService?.register(
 134	 listener: { [weak self] _challenge in
 135	 self?.challengeReceived = _challenge
 136	 self?.configureCaptureSession(challenge: _challenge)
 137	 onChallengeTypeReceived(_challenge)
 138	 },
 139	 on: .challenge)
 140	 }
 141	
 142	 @objc func willResignActive(_ notification: Notification) {
 143	 guard self.livenessState.state != .initial else { return }
 144	 DispatchQueue.main.async {
 145	 self.stopRecording()
 146	 self.livenessState.unrecoverableStateEncountered(.viewResignation)
 147	 }
 148	 }

 151	 captureSession?.startSession()
 152	 }

 155	 captureSession?.stopRunning()
 156	 }

 160	 let avLayer = try captureSession?.configureCamera(frame: frame)
 161	 DispatchQueue.main.async {
 162	 self.livenessState.checkIsFacePrepared()
 163	 }
 164	 return avLayer
 165	 } catch {
 166	 DispatchQueue.main.async {
 167	 self.livenessState.unrecoverableStateEncountered(
 168	 self.generateLivenessError(from: error)
 169	 )
 170	 }
 171	 return nil
 172	 }
 173	 }

 42	 func configureCamera() throws {
 43	 guard let camera = captureDevice.avCaptureDevice
 44	 else { throw LivenessCaptureSessionError.cameraUnavailable }
 45	
 46	 let cameraInput = try AVCaptureDeviceInput(device: camera)
 47	 let videoOutput = AVCaptureVideoDataOutput()
 48	
 49	 teardownExistingSession(input: cameraInput)
 50	 captureSession = AVCaptureSession()
 51	
 52	 guard let captureSession = captureSession else {
 53	 throw LivenessCaptureSessionError.captureSessionUnavailable
 54	 }
 55	
 56	 try setupInput(cameraInput, for: captureSession)
 57	 captureSession.sessionPreset = captureDevice.preset
 58	 try setupOutput(videoOutput, for: captureSession)
 59	 try captureDevice.configure()
 60	
 61	 videoOutput.setSampleBufferDelegate(
 62	 outputDelegate,
 63	 queue: captureQueue
 64	 )
 65	 }
 66	
 67	 func startSession() {
 68	 guard let session = captureSession else { return }
 69	 configurationQueue.async {
 70	 session.startRunning()
 71	 }
 72	 }
 73	
 74	 func stopRunning() {
 75	 guard let session = captureSession else { return }
 76	 defer {
 77	 captureSession = nil
 78	 }
 79	
 80	 if session.isRunning {
 81	 session.stopRunning()
 82	 }
 83	
 84	 for input in session.inputs {
 85	 session.removeInput(input)
 86	 }
 87	 
 88	 for output in session.outputs {
 89	 session.removeOutput(output)
 90	 }
 91	 }
 92	
 93	 private func teardownExistingSession(input: AVCaptureDeviceInput) {
 94	 stopRunning()
 95	 captureSession?.removeInput(input)
 96	 }

 247	 func mapError(_ livenessError: LivenessStateMachine.LivenessError) -> FaceLivenessDetectionError {
 248	 switch livenessError {
 249	 case .userCancelled, .viewResignation:
 250	 return .userCancelled
 251	 case .timedOut:
 252	 return .faceInOvalMatchExceededTimeLimitError
 253	 case .couldNotOpenStream, .socketClosed:
 254	 return .socketClosed
 255	 case .cameraNotAvailable:
 256	 return .cameraNotAvailable
 257	 default:
 258	 return .cameraPermissionDenied
 259	 }
 260	 }

 262	 private func requestCameraPermission(for challenge: Challenge) {
 263	 AVCaptureDevice.requestAccess(
 264	 for: .video,
 265	 completionHandler: { accessGranted in
 266	 guard accessGranted == true else { return }
 267	 displayState = .awaitingLivenessSession(challenge)
 268	 }
 269	 )
 270	 }
 271	
 272	 private func alertCameraAccessNeeded() {
 273	 displayingCameraPermissionsNeededAlert = true
 274	 }
 275	 
 276	 private func checkCameraPermission(for challenge: Challenge) {
 277	 let cameraAuthorizationStatus = AVCaptureDevice.authorizationStatus(for: .video)
 278	 switch cameraAuthorizationStatus {
 279	 case .notDetermined:
 280	 requestCameraPermission(for: challenge)
 281	 case .restricted, .denied:
 282	 alertCameraAccessNeeded()
 283	 case .authorized:
 284	 displayState = .awaitingLivenessSession(challenge)
 285	 @unknown default:
 286	 break
 287	 }
 288	 }
 289	}

 8	import AVFoundation
 9	
 10	struct LivenessCaptureDevice {
 11	 let avCaptureDevice: AVCaptureDevice?
 12	 var preset: AVCaptureSession.Preset = .vga640x480
 13	 var fps: Double = 30
 14	 var exposure: AVCaptureDevice.ExposureMode = .continuousAutoExposure
 15	 var whiteBalance: AVCaptureDevice.WhiteBalanceMode = .continuousAutoWhiteBalance
 16	 var focus: AVCaptureDevice.FocusMode = .continuousAutoFocus
 17	
 18	 func configure() throws {
 19	 guard let avCaptureDevice else { throw LivenessCaptureSessionError.cameraUnavailable }
 20	 try avCaptureDevice.lockForConfiguration()
 21	 defer { avCaptureDevice.unlockForConfiguration() }
 22	
 23	 let fps = CMTimeScale(fps)
 24	 let frameDuration = CMTime(value: 1, timescale: fps)
 25	 avCaptureDevice.activeVideoMinFrameDuration = frameDuration
 26	 avCaptureDevice.activeVideoMaxFrameDuration = frameDuration
 27	 if avCaptureDevice.isExposureModeSupported(exposure) {
 28	 avCaptureDevice.exposureMode = exposure
 29	 }
 30	
 31	 if avCaptureDevice.isFocusModeSupported(focus) {
 32	 avCaptureDevice.focusMode = focus
 33	 }
 34	
 35	 if avCaptureDevice.isWhiteBalanceModeSupported(whiteBalance) {
 36	 avCaptureDevice.whiteBalanceMode = whiteBalance
 37	 }
 38	 }
 39	}

 42	 func configureCamera() throws {
 43	 guard let camera = captureDevice.avCaptureDevice
 44	 else { throw LivenessCaptureSessionError.cameraUnavailable }
 45	
 46	 let cameraInput = try AVCaptureDeviceInput(device: camera)
 47	 let videoOutput = AVCaptureVideoDataOutput()
 48	
 49	 teardownExistingSession(input: cameraInput)
 50	 captureSession = AVCaptureSession()
 51	
 52	 guard let captureSession = captureSession else {
 53	 throw LivenessCaptureSessionError.captureSessionUnavailable
 54	 }
 55	
 56	 try setupInput(cameraInput, for: captureSession)
 57	 captureSession.sessionPreset = captureDevice.preset
 58	 try setupOutput(videoOutput, for: captureSession)
 59	 try captureDevice.configure()
 60	
 61	 videoOutput.setSampleBufferDelegate(
 62	 outputDelegate,
 63	 queue: captureQueue
 64	 )
 65	 }
